relatedBlades.title: Free protection & acceleration for your website
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's mission is to help build a better Internet. We believe every website and application should have free access to foundational security and performance. Sign up today to get your site up and running on the Free plan.

relatedBlades.title: A global immune system for your website or app
relatedBlades.description: Cloudflare threat and network intelligence is built into every connection so you can stay ahead of the ever-changing threat landscape. Cloudflare protects approximately 20% of the web, and blocks an average of %{ThreatsBlockedPerDay} billion threats per day. We make your website safer, faster, and more private for your users.

columnContent.title: Easily manage security and performance
columnContent.description: Set up a domain in 5 minutes. Keep your hosting provider. No code changes required. Protect and accelerate all of your websites, apps, and APIs with unmetered DDoS protection, a global CDN, and more.

iconAssetFile.title: Cloudflare security application - APPROVED Web Icons

columnContent.title: Stop major threats and malicious bots
columnContent.description: Defend against high-severity attacks with Cloudflare's web application firewall (WAF). Protect website text, images, and email addresses from being scraped and misused by bots.

columnContent.title: Optimize for a better user experience
columnContent.description: Cloudflare's application delivery services put your website within milliseconds of nearly every Internet user, helping you easily diagnose UX issues, optimize caching, and accelerate dynamic content.

columnContent.title: Speed up content delivery
columnContent.description: Our industry-leading DNS and content delivery network (CDN) work together automatically to accept requests and serve content from our %{DataCenterCount}-city network. In addition, Argo Smart Routing uses Cloudflare network intelligence to steer dynamic content over the fastest Internet paths.

entry_elementMarkdown.markdown:

content.value: Ensure ultra-fast content delivery via Cloudflare's global network.
Speed up your website with the fastest, most resilient, and most secure authoritative DNS.
Gain insights into your traffic, bandwidth usage, and mitigated attack requests.
Protect against application-layer DDoS attacks of any size and kind.
Secure your site to avoid browser security warnings and search engine deprioritization.
Protect your site from high-severity and widespread attacks.
bots and AI bots from popular cloud providers.
Protect against abusive behavior — DDoS, brute force login, and other attacks.

relatedBlades.description:
Get more from Cloudflare

Take your performance and security even further with these paid products, which can be added to your Free plan.

addOns.entryTitle: AddOn - Argo Smart Routing - Individuals Page

addOns.title: Argo Smart Routing

content.value: Argo Smart Routing is a service that uses optimized routes across the Cloudflare network to deliver responses to your users more quickly, reliably, and securely than the regular Internet. Argo includes: Smart Routing and Tiered Caching.

learnMoreLink.elementName: AddOn - Argo Smart Routing - Individuals Page - Link

callToAction.elementName: AddOn - Argo Smart Routing - Individuals Page - CTA

content.value: Load Balancing prevents service disruptions with local and global traffic load balancing, geographic routing, server health checks, and failover, ensuring the continuous availability of your critical resources.

learnMoreLink.elementName: AddOn - Load Balancing - Individuals Page - Link

callToAction.elementName: AddOn - Load Balancing - Individuals Page - CTA

content.value: Cloudflare Stream makes video storage, encoding, and playback easy. Start for $5 per month for 1,000 minutes of video stored.

content.value: Advanced Certificate Manager is a flexible and customizable way to issue and manage certificates in Cloudflare.

content.value: Cloudflare Access protects internal resources by securing, authenticating and monitoring access per-user and by application.
Rate Limiting protects against denial-of-service attacks, brute-force login attempts, and other types of abusive behavior.

relatedBlades.title: See how people like you use Cloudflare to improve their digital presence.
relatedBlades.description: See how people like you use Cloudflare to enhance their digital presence. Explore innovator spotlights

Scale up with Cloudflare

Choose the right plan based on your business needs.

features.title: Protect against zero-day attacks and common attacks including OWASP vulnerabilities with the WAF
Deploy the [OWASP core ruleset](https://developers.cloudflare.com/waf/managed-rules/reference/owasp-core-ruleset/) to protect against common threats like XSS and SQLi.
Deploy the [Cloudflare managed ruleset](https://developers.cloudflare.com/waf/managed-rules/reference/cloudflare-managed-ruleset/) to mitigate zero-day threats
Detect stolen and exposed credentials

Perform checks against a database of stolen credentials and use security headers to trigger fraud mitigation using the [exposed credentials check.](https://developers.cloudflare.com/waf/managed-rules/reference/exposed-credentials-check/)
Detect and challenge bots
Enable [super bot fight mode](https://developers.cloudflare.com/bots/get-started/pro/) to block and challenge bad bots from any source. Make exceptions to bot settings using WAF Custom Rules.

plansList.description: Enhanced security via customizable features. Recommended for small and medium sized businesses operating online.

featureList1.title: Get everything on the Pro plan, plus:

features.title: Protect against unknown application vulnerabilities with WAF
Leverage [WAF attack score lite's](https://developers.cloudflare.com/waf/about/waf-attack-score/) machine learning models to detect and stop attacks that bypass existing security settings.
PCI and SOC 2 Type II compliance

Cloudflare's WAF and CDN are PCI compliant solutions. [PCI compliance](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/compliance-resources/) is required if you process credit, debit, and/or prepaid cards transactions.
Detect third-party scripts on web apps and receive alerts
Enable [page shield](https://developers.cloudflare.com/page-shield/) to help protect visitors from Magecart-style attacks by receiving alerts about new, unknown, and modified scripts on your site.
Custom SSL certificates
Use your own SSL certificates rather than Cloudflare's universal SSL to control issuance and renewal and support 2nd-, 3rd-, and 4th- level subdomains.
Detect and challenge sophisticated bots
Block or challenge bots with highly variable traffic signatures and novel bot attacks by enabling [super bot fight mode.](https://developers.cloudflare.com/bots/get-started/biz-and-ent/)
Custom nameservers
With custom (or vanity) nameservers, a domain can use Cloudflare DNS without using Cloudflare nameservers.
100% uptime guarantee (SLA)
Cloudflare commits to serving your content 100% of the time without qualification.
Prioritized loading of key site assets
features.description: Enable your server rather than visitors' browsers to prioritize which site resources are loaded first using [enhanced HTTP/2 prioritization](https://developers.cloudflare.com/speed/optimization/protocol/enhanced-http2-prioritization/).

features.title: Intelligent caching for WordPress
features.description: Optimize your WordPress site by using [automatic platform optimization (APO)](https://developers.cloudflare.com/automatic-platform-optimization/) and the Cloudflare plugin to easily cache content. Turn it on and go.

features.title: One-click image optimizations
features.description: Increase speed by auto reducing image sizes. Use [polish](https://developers.cloudflare.com/images/polish/#cloudflare-polish) to apply lossless or lossy compression and use [mirage](https://developers.cloudflare.com/speed/optimization/images/mirage/#cloudflare-mirage) to accelerate image delivery on mobile.

features.title: Cache analytics for CDN optimization
features.description: Use [cache analytics](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cache/performance-review/cache-analytics/) to see what assets cannot be served by the Cloudflare CDN and employ insights to increase cached resources and improve speed.
